tool_description: Assesses and assigns priority level to incoming calls based on caller profile, issue urgency, and business rules.

caller_profile.description: Caller's profile information including tier and status

issue_type.description: Specific type of issue or inquiry

urgency_indicators.description: Array of urgency keywords or indicators

previous_escalations.description: Number of previous escalations for this caller

callback_request.description: Whether this is a callback from previous interaction

business_hours.description: Whether call is during business hours

complaint_flag.description: Whether this is flagged as a complaint

error_messages: Invalid customer tier: Must be one of [standard, premium, vip].
Invalid priority assessment: Unable to determine priority from provided information.
Missing required profile data: Caller profile information incomplete or invalid.
Conflicting priority indicators: Multiple contradictory priority signals detected.
usage: Provide caller_profile, call_category, and issue_type with optional parameters to assess call priority level for routing decisions.

priority_level.description: Assigned priority level (low, medium, high, critical)

sla_target.description: Target response time in minutes based on priority
